There should not be any server certificates stored in AWS IAM
Lambda functions should be deleted after 30 days of no use
ACM Certificates should be monitored for revocation
API Gateway Rest APIs should use an API Gateway resource policy
API Gateway Rest APIs should use an API Gateway Lambda authorizer
Distributions should have a Default Viewer certificate in place
Distributions should have Default TLS enabled
Distributions using Custom Origins should be using TLSv1.2
Trusted signers should have key pairs
EC2 Instances should be configured to use Secure Enclaves
EC2 Instances should not be internet-facing
EC2 Instances should use Source-Destination checks unless absolutely not required
EC2 Instances should use AMIs that are less than 3 months old
Serial port access to EC2 should be prohibited unless absolutely required
ECR Registires should be have a registry policy configured to allow for cross-account recovery
ECR Registires should use image replication to promote disaster recovery readiness
ECS Task Definitions should not run privileged containers if not required
ECS Task Definitions for EC2 should have Docker Security Options (SELinux or AppArmor) configured
EFS File Systems should not use the default file system policy
Elasticsearch Service domains should be in a VPC
Application Load Balancers should have HTTP Desync protection enabled
Group inline policies should follow least privilege principles
Role inline policies should follow least privilege principles
Managed policies should follow least privilege principles
User inline policies should follow least privilege principles
Image pipeline tests should be enabled
Image recipes should encrypt EBS volumes
Lambda function Layers should not be publicly shared
RDS Aurora Clusters should use Database Activity Streams
RDS Aurora Clusters should be encrypted
CloudFormation Stack parameters should not have secrets stored in Plaintext
CodeBuild Project environment variabless should not have secrets stored in Plaintext
EC2 User Data should not have secrets stored in Plaintext
ECS Task Definition environment variables should not have secrets stored in Plaintext
Amazon Macie V2 should be enabled
AWS WAFv2 Regional Web ACLs should be used
AWS WAFv2 Global (CloudFront) Web ACLs should be used
Security groups should not allow unrestricted NFS (TCP 2049) access
Security groups should not allow unrestricted Rsync (TCP 873) access
Security groups should not allow unrestricted TFTP (UDP 69) access
Resources under attack in the last week
Route 53 Hosted Zones should be protected by Shield Advanced
Global Accelerator Accelerators should be protected by Shield Advanced
SQS messages should not be older than 80 percent of message retention
Subnets should not automatically map Public IP addresses on launch
Subnets should be monitored for available IP address space
WAFv2 Web ACLs should have CloudWatch Metrics enabled
WAFv2 Web ACLs should have Request Sampling enabled
WAFv2 Global Web ACLs should have CloudWatch Metrics enabled
WAFv2 Global Web ACLs should have Request Sampling enabled
X-Ray Encryption Configure should use a KMS CMK
